text:
#Chloroquine can be purchased without prescription to prevent #malaria with 1 pill a week! If used in the same way, could this cheap drug help stop the spread of #COVIDー19 #coronavirus? 
@TorontoStar @globeandmail @CBCNews @CBC we need answers from @JustinTrudeau @GovCanHealth! https://t.co/3akWJRo8fQ
